Top 5 recommended document review guidelines and protocols
Sep 6, 2020
6 min read
technical-writing
The documents you prepare may be perfect in your eyes, but there is always room for improvement. You need someone to evaluate your documents for technical and grammatical accuracy or content structure. Always remember, the quality of the document reflects the quality of the product.

Content Strategy or Strategic Content
Aug 16, 2020
2 min read
technical-writing
Content strategists often present content strategy as a medicine for all the content related problems. But, does a content strategy, howsoever effective, is "the remedy" to all the ills ailing the content industry?
